Package.Name: NOTES: AGQJ Gun Sounds by Fedor Saveliev (SoundEventInjector)
Package.UpdateComment:
0. Soundinjektor is a great tool for modding sounds - no Patches are needed - updating gets much easier
1. Problem: Working alone as intended check replays
2. Problem: Soundinjektor is incompatible with WWIIHWA (WOT-Circle -- restart->crash->restart->crash....)
3. Dont have Ideas/ muse / moods for fixing now -123gauss
Package.Description:
Test commit to MASTER after merging branch "Korolins2". Note: Pull the modinfo.xml again by hand

27.07.2018: 
added old non-SoundEventInjector zip-file (_res_mods.zip), cause there is a patch inside

Package.Description:
With Sound Event Injector; 
- great tool for modding sounds 
- no patches for the Events are needed 

No PYmods_BanksLoader - only Patches to engine_config.xml

Usable with WWIIHWA (no Bankloader - Patches used)
- Sound Event Injector is compatible with WWIIHWA

Package.Name: NOTES: Gun Sounds by Ed76na & Apa6ecka
Package.UpdateComment:
Dont use this version(PYmods_BanksLoader) with WWIIHWA: 
- Sound Event Injector is incompatible with WWIIHWA
- "WoT-Circle": Restart -> Crash -> Restart -> Crash....)
Sound Event Injector : 
- great tool for modding sounds 
- no patches are needed 
- updating get much easier & faster

Willster: 
I dont know what we do with tthe Sound Event Injector Versions (script-file)

- take audio.xml/engine.config.xml

Package.Description:
Dont forget : I (Zorgane) need reviews ! - use devolper website to do this please

V. 2.05 Patchnote Compatibility with 1.4.0.1
Added : 
Beta engines sounds based on Gnomefather and Kriegstreiber work. 
Only some tanks are available for now and I need to know your opinion about them.
Engines for : 
Tiger 131, HT n°6, Tiger I/II, Tiger (P), VK 4502 A/B, PzVII, Maus, E-75, E100, JpE100, VK3002 M/D, Panther I/II, E50, ARL 44, AMX M4 45/51/54/65t, AMX AC 46/50/B, Cromwell, AT 7/15, Centurion I, ST-I, T-10 (IS-8). 

Note : Scripts for remodels are unavailable for the moment.

Package.Name: Company of Heroes
Package.UpdateComment: Updated 1.10 2018-08-31\n\nRemoved ekspont_load.wotmod & LobbyApi.wotmod
Package.Description:
Siegfried by Strategic_Music+Andre_V_german
Note for youtube: Just wait ca. 20 seconds (russian language over)
Crew Sound Steel Foxes by Strategic Music and Andre_V
-provides alternative voice reactions from the tank crew. 
-More than 750 phrases for 45 different in-game situations.
-gives you a new gaming experience
-new emotions, atmosphere and some humor

The mod team:
Dmitry Kuzmenko – original idea, voice direction, script writing
Sergey Eybog - Technical director - Sergey Eybog
Erich Muff, Manuel Haefele - german Voice
Andrew Burmistrov, Savva Dudin, Stan Polesko, Ekaterina Kuzmenko - Sound editors
Olga Nigmatulina - Artist

Removed ekspont_load.wotmod & LobbyApi.wotmod
Package.Description:
Steel Foxes with Strategic Music & Andre_V
Note for youtube: Just wait ca. 20 seconds (russian language over)
-provides alternative voice reactions from the tank crew. 
-More than 750 phrases for 45 different in-game situations.
-gives you a new gaming experience
-new emotions, atmosphere and some humor

The mod team:
Dmitry Kuzmenko – original idea, voice direction, script writing
Will Bucknum – script writing, voice direction
Aaron Baca – script writing
Technical director – Serge Eybog
Sound design – Andrew Burmistrov, Stas Polesko, Petr Yakyamsev
Douglas Pullar – commander
John Bell – additional voice-over

Package.Description:
Hard Rock Attack for WoT with more than 190 tracks.

Here is an incomplete list of tracks that sound in this fashion:
-Music in action: Saliva, PopEvil, Marauder, Shakra, BonJovi, Negative, Sabaton, Dharmata, Marrok, Avenger, Saidian, Sister, Tremonti, Striker, UDO, Wolf, Sturm Und Drang, Motley Crue, Rage, Crashdiet, Conquest, House Of Lords, Shylock, Soulhealer, Death Angel, Crematory, Ibridoma.
-Music in the hangar: Accept, Allen, Axxis, Papa Roach, WASP, Scorpions, Hedley, Weezer, Noctura, Skylark, Noctura.
-Music when downloading maps: Avenged Sevenfold, Helloween, Mark Knopfler, Def Leppard, Dream Theater, Emppu Vuorinen.

Package.Name: Epic Mega Music Collection by jakis_nick
Package.UpdateComment:
Updated: 2019-02-07: v1.4.0.2 (v1.2.0.2 vs 1.4.0.0_02)
+ added 4 new albums
+ increased shuffle tracks option
+ fixed issue with no music after leaving battle arena when the battle is still countinuen
+ one playlist starts on loadingscreen and ends when the battle ends (countinious music without break)

PATCH NEEDED: For res\audioww\Init.bnk 
No Patches needed: music_interactive.pck & loginscreen.bnk & utility.bnk (original files as template)
Package.Description:
EMMC:Epic Mega Music Collection by jakis_nick 
+ made with new project 1.2 from WG: There is a music on every map
+ contains 411 (2018-12-15) tracks of trailer music, such bands as:
-Audiomachine, 
-Battle X Music, 
-Colossal Trailer Music, 
-Epic North, 
-Ninja Tracks.

The tracks were sorted so that they would not be repeated in different events.

Package.Name: Hiroyuki Sawano's Epic Anime Music
Package.UpdateComment:
res\audioww\music_interactive.bnk
res\audioww\music_interactive.pck
 (original files by WG as template =>No Patches needed)


https://wgmods.net/2474/details/
Package.Description:
Hiroyuki Sawano is a Japanese composer and musician best known for his work on many anime, TV series, and movies.

In this mod you will be able to enjoy his epic soundtracks while playing tanks !
Soundtracks are chosen from famous animes such as Attack On Titan, Re:Creators, Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn, Aldnoah.Zero, etc.

Music in following places will be replaced:
Hanger, Battle, Loading screen, Win/Lose/Draw screen

============================================================

Sawano’s work has been made into wot mod since 2013 and I had a lot of good experiences while using it, but I’m so sad that the original mod maker is no longer active. So I decide to make this mod and bring those experiences back to players!

============================================================

1.1.0
2018.12.14 Version update
1.0.3
1.We changed the way the atmosphere music was played.
2.Fixed the problem of different musical sound sizes.
3.Fixed bug.
1.0.1
2018.11.28 1.We've added a new music model - atmosphere music（When there is too much difference in the number of troops between the two sides in battle or be a few minutes away from the end of the battle, it will trigger）.
2.All music in MOD is replaced by high quality（320kbps）.
3.Different kinds of new music（Role song，Season 2 Music, etc.） have been added.
4.Fixed the problem of overlapping music.
5.This is what we think is the best version.
6.Enjoy your game

0.2.1
-Added hangar music.
-Added countdown music.
-Repair music repeat BUG

res\audioww\loginscreen.PCK => PATCH

Change Log
- G2M2H2F: End of development
- G2M2H2: Fixed a problem with the lack of votes after interacting with a dynamic platoon
- G2M2H1: Fixed a bug of uneven musical utilities during the start of the Erlnberg, Ruinberg and Himmelsdorf maps and music lapses on the charging screens
- G2M2H0: Bug fixes with Music version 2
- G2M2: Music in version 2 has been added:
-The music now matches the maps and does not repeat
-An intro to the maps has been added
Package.Description:
Are you a fan of the Incredibles?
Or maybe you have quite a boring and repeatable game in WoT?
Install this fashion and go on a journey with the characters of the iconic Disney Pixar animation "The Incredibles"

• 18 different interactive music tracks.
- Including The Glory Days, Off To Work, Road Trip! and many more songs!
• Special cuts of songs played while loading battles.
- They build tension and encourage action!

Thee author Ketrab8 stopped playing WoT and will never update his mods again. 
As long as they are working we keep the mods in the DB.
https://wgmods.net/1542/

Ketrab8- > EVGA 18.01.2019: Never. Quitting the game, sorry.
